name: First Person Pong
description:
First Person Pong is a 3D game inspired by the classic game Pong.

Two modes
  • 1v1 mode: a local multiplayer mode that resembles the classic game Pong in a 3D environment
  • Goal mode: a singleplayer mode where the player tries to direct the ball toward a moving goal and at the same time to not miss it

In 1v1 mode, you can play using mouse and keyboard for the upper player and a controller for the lower player.

Catch the ball

You can catch the ball to direct it in a specific direction.

You can hold the ball to increase its speed. The longer you hold it, the greater the increase. If you hold the ball more than 1 second, the ball explodes and the opponent scores a point.

The ball changes color when you catch it, from white to yellow, and then gradually turns to red.
